ProductInfo.Features:
Color CCD image sensor. Horizontal resolution: 420 TVL. NTSC System
Built-in 4-9mm varifocal lens. Minimum illumination: 0.1 Lux
Lens allow 355 degree horizontal and 45 degree vertical rotation for adjustment by manual
Humanization three-dimensional bracket. Weatherproof housing designed for outdoor and indoor application
Package including: 1 x security camera, 1 x mounting bracket, 1 x power supply, 1 x video power extension cable and 1 x bonus warning sticker
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu Security Camera Color CCD Outdoor Zoom Lens Dome Home CCTV Surveillance Kit with Power Supply, Video Power Extension Cable and Bonus Warning Sticker CHQ
